# loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader { #brdr.be.grb.loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader }

```python
be.grb.loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader(year, aligner, partition=1000)
```

Loader for fiscal parcel data (Adpf) for a specific year.

This loader retrieves the cadastral situation as it was registered
for fiscal purposes at the start of a specific year.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name      | Type                | Description                                             | Default    |
|-----------|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| year      | [str](`str`)        | The fiscal year to retrieve parcels for (e.g., "2023"). | _required_ |
| aligner   | [Any](`typing.Any`) | The aligner object providing spatial context and CRS.   | _required_ |
| partition | [int](`int`)        | Number of features per request, by default 1000.        | `1000`     |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [load_data](#brdr.be.grb.loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader.load_data) | Download and process fiscal parcel data for the specified year. |

### load_data { #brdr.be.grb.loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader.load_data }

```python
be.grb.loader.GRBFiscalParcelLoader.load_data()
```

Download and process fiscal parcel data for the specified year.

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                | Description                                                |
|--------|---------------------|------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | [Any](`typing.Any`) | The result of the parent GeoJsonLoader's load_data method. |

#### Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type                       | Description                                   |
|--------|----------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
|        | [ValueError](`ValueError`) | If thematic data is missing from the aligner. |
